entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 30 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
